Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace Ward 10
Rigolette Sch.Dist. No.11 -- 2.04 Mill - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
RIGOLETTE SCHOOL DISTRICT NUMBER 11 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 2.04 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR CONSTRUCTING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING SCHOOL BUILDINGS AND EQUIPMENT AND OTHERWISE IMPROVING SCHOOL FACILITIES AND PREMISES.
Race.FullText: Shall Rigolette School District Number 11 of Rapides Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of two and four hundredths (2.04) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017 (an estimated $136,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating school buildings and equipment and otherwise improving school facilities and premises?

Race.SpecificTitle: Big Island Sch.Dist.No.50 -- Prop. #1 - 10.05 Mill - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 10.05 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND/OR OPERATING THE PUBLIC SCHOOLS AND PUBLIC SCHOOL SYSTEM IN THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Big Island School District Number 50 of Rapides Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten and five hundredths (10.05) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017 (an estimated $132,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the public schools and public school system in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Big Island Sch.Dist.No.50 -- Prop. #2 - 4.17 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 4.17 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR CONSTRUCTING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING SCHOOLS IN THE DISTRICT AND RECREATIONAL FACILITIES AND PROGRAMS IN CONNECTION THEREWITH, INCLUDING PAYMENT OF SALARIES THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall Big Island School District Number 50 of Rapides Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of four and seventeen hundredths (4.17) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017 (an estimated $55,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating schools in the District and recreational facilities and programs in connection therewith, including the payment of salaries therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fifth Wd. Sch.Dist. No.51 -- 7 Mill - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIFTH WARD SCHOOL DISTRICT NO. 51 PROPOSITION 
(MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 7 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR PROVIDING ADDITIONAL SUPPORT FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, REPAIRING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND/OR OPERATING SCHOOLS AND SCHOOL RELATED FACILITIES IN SAID SCHOOL DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Fifth Ward School District No. 51 of the Parish of Rapides, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of seven (7) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017 (an estimated $49,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for the purpose of providing additional support for acquiring, constructing, repairing, improving, maintaining and/or operating schools and school related facilities and programs in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Ruby-Wise Sch.Dist. No.56 -- 2.02 Mill - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
RUBY-WISE SCHOOL DISTRICT NO. 56 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2.02 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR CONSTRUCTING, MAINTAINING, AND OPERATING SCHOOLS IN THE DISTRICT AND RECREATIONAL FACILITIES AND PROGRAMS IN CONNECTION THEREWITH, INCLUDING THE PAYMENT OF SALARIES THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall Ruby-Wise School District No. 56 of Rapides Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of two and two hundredths (2.02) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017 (an estimated $7,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating schools in the District and recreational facilities and programs in connection therewith, including the payments of salaries therefor?
